idea-plugin.name: Code2QRcode
idea-plugin.description:
This is a tool that can help developers easily share the code in the idea when they need it.
Developers can select the code and click to generate a QR code, which is convenient for sharing the code quickly and accurately. Recipients can use any QR code recognition tool to extract the results.
In addition, it supports viewing the generated QR code in toolwindow and saving the QR code in PNG format to local disk.
It also supports creating web sharing links, burning after reading web sharing links (i.e. once link), and supports using custom passwords to restrict access to web sharing content.
The content shared through the web can support the display of Java, Python, C/C++, GO, MarkDown, Json, Bash, text and other formats.

Now supports [Chinese] and [special characters]

这是一款可以帮助开发者在需要便捷分享IDEA内代码的工具。
开发者可以选中代码后一键生成二维码，便于快速精准得进行分享代码，接受者可以使用任意二维码识别工具提取结果。
支持在ToolWindow中查看生成的二维码、保存二维码格式为PNG图片到本地磁盘中。
支持创建web分享链接、阅后即焚web分享链接，并且支持对web分享的内容使用自定义密码限制访问。
通过web分享的内容可以支持Java、Python、C/C++、GO、MarkDown、Json、Bash、文本等格式展示。

现在已经支持[中文]和[特殊字符]
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Version 2.1.2, this version includes the main functions of the original version: generating any QR code, displaying QR codes in the ToolWindow, and saving PNG images to the local disk.
It supports creating web share links, one-time web share links (i.e., once links), and password protection for web-shared content.
The web-shared content can be displayed in formats such as Java, Python, C/C++, GO, MarkDown, Json, Bash, and plain text.
Compared to version 2.1.1, it adds support for Chinese characters and special characters, a one-click copy button, and a prompt after copying.

Added support for Chinese characters and special characters
Added a one-click copy button and a prompt after copying


2.1.2版本，此版本包含原始版本的选择任意二维码生成、在ToolWindow展示二维码、保存png图片到本地磁盘的主体功能
支持创建web分享链接、阅后即焚web分享链接（也即once link），并且支持对web分享的内容使用自定义密码限制访问。
通过web分享的内容可以支持Java、Python、C/C++、GO、MarkDown、Json、Bash、文本等格式展示。
相对于2.1.1版本，新增对中文和特殊字符的支持、新增一键复制按钮和复制成功后的提示。
